file_intent: Interactive searchable, sortable list UI component

responsibility_blocks.description: Debounce a value with a delay to reduce updates
responsibility_blocks.label: Debounce hook

responsibility_blocks.description: Manage query, sort, selection, and loading/error states for the list
responsibility_blocks.label: Searchable list state

responsibility_blocks.description: Apply debounced query to memoized filtering
responsibility_blocks.label: Query debouncing usage

responsibility_blocks.description: Sort filtered results by selected field and order
responsibility_blocks.label: Sorting of filtered items

responsibility_blocks.description: Notify parent of selected item and store current selection
responsibility_blocks.label: Selection handler

responsibility_blocks.description: Clear search query and reset selection
responsibility_blocks.label: Clear search action

responsibility_blocks.description: Render error banner and dismiss action
responsibility_blocks.label: Error UI

responsibility_blocks.description: Input field, clear button, and sort dropdown UI
responsibility_blocks.label: Render/search UI

responsibility_blocks.description: Show results count or empty state message
responsibility_blocks.label: Results count & empty state

responsibility_blocks.description: Render list of items with selection state
responsibility_blocks.label: List rendering
